entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:16 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: ENE 27 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
